pullrequest.title: Add command to send a request with gz topic

content.raw:
I did not use the script. It should be fixed now.

I also added a small test in gz\_TEST.cc and modified `gz topic` description.

Note that I also plan to make another pull request on top of that one to add `gz topic -p` to publish a message on a topic: [https://bitbucket.org/ocrave/gazebo/commits/cb13af6893ceef87cbb6afbee08f03e48fb5b477?at=gz\_topic\_publish](https://bitbucket.org/ocrave/gazebo/commits/cb13af6893ceef87cbb6afbee08f03e48fb5b477?at=gz_topic_publish)
content.html:
I did not use the script. It should be fixed now.

I also added a small test in gz_TEST.cc and modified gz topic description.

Note that I also plan to make another pull request on top of that one to add gz topic -p to publish a message on a topic: https://bitbucket.org/ocrave/gazebo/commits/cb13af6893ceef87cbb6afbee08f03e48fb5b477?at=gz_topic_publish
